Review Content: I can't understand how this school got over 7/10 .. the personal don't give 2 cents about students, cafeteria is literally stealing from students.. charging for utensils... 15d for a burger and fries and you get no condiments..no tomato or lettuce. You take appointments with staff and they don't show up . Teachers disrespect you publicly...humiliate students that don't understand quick enough for them, charge crazy amounts for parking. The only way you'll be happy here is if you're in the sports programs.
I loved every day of my study in this cegep. Friendly atmosphere, good infrastructure, the best professors ever who are, in general, really interested in your success.

The cafeteria is way overpriced, and they don't seem to even care about their customer. They ask a 60 cent """donation""" for a plastic fork, and when I told them I don't have change, the cashier just shrugged and said "sorry"... Like damn I buy your coffee nearly every day and I can't even get a plastic fork?? That's the kind of incidents that make people like this place even less
Yo pump'O'King hit me up dude. You seem like a fun person. I can't wait to finish this session.
